attributes.action: cut the drink driving limit from 80mg/100ml to 50mg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BMA Cyrmu Wales calls for a reduction in the permitted blood alcohol concentration for driving throughout the UK. 

We want to see the maximum level reduced from 80 mg per 100 ml to 50mg. 

This would bring the UK in line with many other European countries.
